categories: Category:Unidentified Jedi of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: A Jedi was a Human male who was sensitive to the Force and was trained as a Jedi. During the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic, he lived as a hermit on a world with a snowy environment. The Jedi was dark-skinned with gray hair and a beard, and wore brown Jedi robes. He also owned a lightsaber.

The character was depicted on the "Jedi Hermit" card for the Champions of the Force card set, which was the base set of cards for the Star Wars Galaxies Trading Card Game. He was illustrated by artist Mark Poole.
